system.description: At 10th level, when you cast a spell that summons beasts or fey, you may instead summon a manifestation of a constellation instead. The creatures summoned have resistance to radiant damage and damage from non-magical weapons, Truesight, and their attacks all deal an additional 1d6 radiant damage. You may also gain the same benefits when you use a Wildshape. You may only apply these benefits once per short or long rest.
